com.asoroka.sidora.tabularmetadata

Class TabularScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.UnmodifiableIterator<T>
      • com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>
        • com.asoroka.sidora.tabularmetadata.TabularScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>

    public class TabularScanner
extends com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>
    Value scanning workflow. Handed a CSVParser, this class will scan through it and supply the values of fields to a configured "row" of ValueHeuristic strategies cloned from the configured choice.
    Author:
    ajs6f

      • computeNext

        protected org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord computeNext()
        Specified by:
        computeNext in class com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>

      • scan

        public void scan(int limit)
        Scan rows in our CSV up to a limit, exhausting values from the internal parser as we do.
        WARNING: Be careful about calling this more than once on a TabularScanner. The internal parser of a scanner cannot be reset.
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of rows to scan, 0 for all rows.

      • getTypeStrategies

        public List<TypeDeterminingHeuristic<?>> getTypeStrategies()
        Use this to recover and interrogate the type determining strategy instances used in scanning.
        Returns:
        the row of strategies used to determine the types of fields

      • getRangeStrategies

        public List<RangeDeterminingHeuristic<?>> getRangeStrategies()
        Use this to recover and interrogate the range determining strategy instances used in scanning.
        Returns:
        the row of strategies used to determine the ranges of fields

      • getEnumStrategies

        public List<EnumeratedValuesHeuristic<?>> getEnumStrategies()
        Use this to recover and interrogate the enumerated-values determining strategy instances used in scanning.
        Returns:
        the row of strategies used to determine the enumerated values presented in fields
